pageProps.html:
N-ary Tree Level Order Traversal

Description

doc

Solutions

First Idea

/**
 * // Definition for a Node.
 * function Node(val,children) {
 *    this.val = val;
 *    this.children = children;
 * };
 */

/**
 * @param {Node|null} root
 * @return {number[][]}
 */
var levelOrder = function (root) {
  if (!root) {
    return []
  }

  let result = []
  let curLevel = []

  let curQueue = [root]
  let nextQueue = []

  while (curQueue.length) {
    const cur = curQueue.shift()

    curLevel.push(cur.val)
    cur.children.forEach((v) => v && nextQueue.push(v))

    if (!curQueue.length) {
      curQueue = nextQueue
      result.push(curLevel)
      curLevel = []
      nextQueue = []
    }
  }

  return result
}
  • Time Complexity: O(n)
  • Space Complexity: O(n)
